MODULE.name: MODULE_ID_DECIMATE
MODULE.description:
decimate in the audio preprocessor#[ #] path.
This module supports the following parameter IDs 
DECIMATE_PARAM_MOD_ENABLE
DECIMATE_PARAM_DECIMATION_FACTOR
DECIMATE_PARAM_COEFF_ARR#[ #] Supported Input Media Format:
All parameter IDs are device independent.
Supported Input Media Format:
* - Data Format : FIXED_POINT
* -#[ #] fmt_id : Don't care
* - Sample Rates : Any (>0)
* - Number of channels : 1 to 32
* - Channel type : 1 to 63
* -#[ #] Bits per sample : 16, 24, 32
* - Q format : 15 for bits per sample = 16 and 27 for bps = 32 and bps = 24
* - Interleaving :#[ #] de-interleaved unpacked
* - Signed/unsigned : Signed

PARAMETER.name: DECIMATE_PARAM_MOD_ENABLE
PARAMETER.description: ID for the Enable parameter used by any audio processing module.#[ #] This generic/common parameter is used to configure or determine the state of any audio processing module.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies whether the module is to be enabled or disabled.

PARAMETER.name: DECIMATE_PARAM_DECIMATION_FACTOR
PARAMETER.description:
Decimate algorithm.
Fixed size for this parameter#[ #] 
Version 0 - 4 bytes

PARAMETER.name: DECIMATE_PARAM_COEFF_ARR
PARAMETER.description: parameter used to send the coefficients to RX from the control#[ #] module.
